Package com.apriori.util Description

Miscellaneous utility classes.

This includes several new functional interfaces, like PartialFunction (and its kin) and numerous primitive specializations of standard interfaces (like BooleanBinaryOperator, FloatPredicate, and ShortConsumer to name just a few).

Also included is a Clock and a Stopwatch. The Clock varies considerably from the JRE's Clock. The one here is not meant for general date and time use or inter-op with the java.time package. Instead, it is a light-weight way to abstract System#currentTimeMillis(), System#nanoTime(), and Thread#sleep(long), mainly for testability. (See FakeClock.)
